simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: redo restarts a loop block without evaluating the conditional again. The optional expression argument may evaluate to a positive integer number that indicates which level of the nested loops should be restarted. If omitted, it defaults to 1, i.e. the innermost loop.
Using this command outside a loop causes an immediate run-time error.

example.title: Restart a higher level loop from an inner one
